  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="6686" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="6686" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.70</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="6233">6,233</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="467"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Blanche</b> by <b>Byredo</b> is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women. <b>Blanche</b> was launched in 2009. Top notes are Aldehydes, Rose and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Peony, Violet and African Orange Flower; base notes are Musk, Woodsy Notes and Sandalwood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Blanche is a fragrance by Byredo introduced in 2009. Just like its name suggests, the perfume is dedicated to white colour. It is airy and simple in its structure, but captures thoughts about a certain person who inspired the creator with its innocence.</p>

<p>The perfume opens with white roses, pink pepper and aldehydes. A heart includes violet, neroli and peony. A base is enriched with blond wood, sandalwood and musk. The perfume is available as EDP 100ml.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                             <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">

                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Uninviting and sterile unisex scent
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">

                    Generic and overrated

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="6686"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.165.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Aldehydes-165.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Aldehydes</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.81007176538254; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.105.jpg" style="width: 2.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rose-105.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Rose</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.7714097663321; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.91.jpg" style="width: 2.65rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pink-Pepper-91.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pink Pepper</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.92711643842836; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.155.jpg" style="width: 3.475rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Peony-155.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Peony</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89484207200892; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.116.jpg" style="width: 3.275rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Violet-116.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Violet</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82555956097059; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.16.jpg" style="width: 2.9rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Orange-Blossom-16.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>African Orange Flower</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.99369078914674; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 3.95rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.7475514178297; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.315.jpg" style="width: 2.55rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Woody-Notes-315.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Woodsy Notes</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="6686"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='db4e4b0353b781c5b349e61427e0b13d271' slotpayload='{"ct":"Qiba0AAkG+3Eqyrp5piPSByzD7zpmyMazKPOUQ++5LVfGS6nqEJPb9cJ47B5gTknYFvNBB0XaxV0wzfI7oIas1DphKDVlpO9i91WYD2WPu\/WyLKS3KSnvh\/BWWEcbL9epBIPwDk9CMHwZjhkoJOwQEhcZos\/jTCETak27R0I1\/4Llmvia\/BfjJPwNnyzUOHZuoBYh9Ygmb9P7ggAFXi4A4EqWQ\/Ko7qyOMKN0GephqHdIuVhfFPk4dt3ZAtqgRDb3CvNurcEZJWoqy6dyI\/c1dB7UOIRSSF83su24vK\/BNg=","iv":"7501ae4cb24398d21cb74341e29d0863","s":"a0692a48fb397cc9"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369091" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Az-316"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/180751"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.180751.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Az-316" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2369091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2369091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2368412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2368412" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Allisonclopez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2259960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2259960.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Allisonclopez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6686.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanche"title="Blanche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2368412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2368412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2259960">Allisonclopez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-02">12/02/24 12:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent is so addictiveI cant stop smelling myself and feeling so clean and luxurious, also got the cream, which perfectly complements it for everyday wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2368412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2368412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367224" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367224" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="13DelanceySt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2190725"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2190725.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="13DelanceySt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Ginger-Biscuit-Cologne-2023-87708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ginger Biscuit Cologne (2023)"title="Ginger Biscuit Cologne (2023)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367224ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367224" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2190725">13DelanceySt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 10:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Veering into cheap candle territoryhere, one marked Fresh Linen. While I dont have a lot of experience with clean fragrances, I would think that there are others that do it more successfully for a less excessive price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2367224"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2367224#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2359998" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="orpheusdream"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1420663"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1420663.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="orpheusdream" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2359998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2359998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1420663">orpheusdream</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 13:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I often dislike derogatory comparisons like this smells like laundry detergent, or whatever subjective and outright strange associations some might have. However, in the case of <i>Blanche</i>, I do understand this comparison. Its high on aldehydes. Strangely I get quite a lot of lemon, although not listed. Aldehydic citrus-floral. Super synthetic. Smells like a high-priced perfume disguised as a supermarket fragrance. Performance is a bit on the weaker side, but acceptable. Growing up in the 90s, I kind of like this aldehydic overdose. Nostalgia somehow. Artificial chic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2359998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2359998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2354665" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2354665" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="archerries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2057645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="archerries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2354665ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2354665" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2057645">archerries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19">11/19/24 15:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aldehydes take centre stage with fragrance, making it incredibly soapy. The aldehydic intensity can't even be described as "fresh linen" but rather straight up dish soap. It's giving fairy liquid.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2354665"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2354665#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

Why would you want to smell like laundry detergent?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2352235"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2352235#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352092" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352092" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cherry_Darling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1003821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cherry_Darling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Candy-Love-62791.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62791.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Candy Love"title="Candy Love"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352092ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352092" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821">Cherry_Darling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 11:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells a touch fabreezy to me, but in a good way! I actually smelled several fabreezes today and had a good chuckle remembering the tiktok girlies who secretly used them as perfume. Very clean girl, aldehydes not too strong, not too soapy, no distinct florals, just a light fresh skin scent. Not particularly the expensive kind so I wouldn't personally buy a bottle but it's perfectly enjoyable, in a fabreezy kind of way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2352092"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2352092#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348952" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006183">Marina1111</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 12:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It makes my mood better</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2348952"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2348952#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340897" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340897" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NellieV3rlie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314121"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NellieV3rlie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340897ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340897" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314121">NellieV3rlie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can see why some people would enjoy this fragrance. It's good for when you want to smell really clean or fresh (clean girl kinda vibe, maybe for some ppl with OCD lol), but for me it's a no. To my nose it smells simple, like a one-dimensional scent, that just reminds me of two things: either a strong cleaning product or some kind of laundry detergent. Byredo looked at these clean, fresh smells as an inspiration and -in my opinion- took them way too literally. It literally smells like putting your head into a bucket of soap. Also not even that good of a soap smell. Rather sharp and stingy... It is not awful to me but also not even say I'd 'like' it. It's too much of a detergent smell. Not perfume. You'd be better off financially by just rubbing some Persil or Ariel on your wrists. 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2340897"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2340897#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339666" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2339666" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mark Sanchez"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1102248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1102248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mark Sanchez" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2339666ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2339666" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1102248">Mark Sanchez</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 04:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The initial spray immediately reminded me of the smell inside a pet shop. The one that they use to neutralize the odor inside. It has this strong soapy smell which can be overpowering. More than three sprays of this perfume will definitely suffocate you. The beauty of this perfume lies in its dry down. The smell of it brings a lot of memories from freshly washed clothes to a squeaky-clean restroom.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2339666"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2339666#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338853" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333362" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="elizabeth.grayton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/959756"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.959756.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="elizabeth.grayton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); I love the musky aldehyde and the cleanest of it. I smell crisp, clean sheets next to freshly washed warm, creamy, moisturised skin and it is super pleasant.<br />
<br />
I love all scents pretty much, I have issues with my sight and hearing, so my sense of smell is really where I get so much pleasure  especially woody florals, orientals and gourmands but there is a place in my perfume life for this and also, another favourite in the same ilk, MFK 724.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/353043">KittyBaditty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 22:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this smells like freshly washed sheets on the washing line on a sunny day. Or white hotel soap and warm water. I think it's delightful. <br />
<br />
FWIW though, PdM Valaya is my go to clean scent, and gets more compliments than anything else I own. Im not *super* into it but it nails the clean girl aesthetic and fills a room with such an amazing clean, fresh, unique smell. Byredo Blanche is straight up laundry detergent or hotel soap. Which I love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2323425"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2323425#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323420" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kendralh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2289727"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kendralh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323420ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323420" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2289727">Kendralh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 22:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like baby powder, but worse. Smelled fine on the tester, but on my skin it's atrocious. Old people and baby powder. <br />
<br />
I gave it an hour to settle hoping it would improve, as my experience is that many Byredo take some time to settle and reach their full potential, but it just kept getting worse. I tried to wash it off to no avail-- it's been TWO DAYS and I can still smell it on my arm where I sprayed it. So I guess... yay longevity?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2323420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2323420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322275" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2322275" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="babycheese"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2186864"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2186864.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="babycheese" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3575.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gypsy Water"title="Gypsy Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2322275ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2322275" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2186864">babycheese</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 19:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>theoretically i should love this bc i love clean scents but the sweetness in this smells so cheap and fake 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2322275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2322275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321430" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321430" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Petals_and_Perfumes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/118345"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.118345.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Petals_and_Perfumes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Mandarino-di-Amalfi-Acqua-44084.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44084.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mandarino di Amalfi Acqua"title="Mandarino di Amalfi Acqua"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321430ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321430" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/118345">Petals_and_Perfumes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 23:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>10/19/24 - I Do NOT recommend.<br />
I agree with the reviewer who wrote that the scent reminded them of the soap used in a local fast food restaurant. The soap is Safeguard antibacterial liquid cream-orange in color.<br />
<br />
I cannot stand that soap! Im sure now that its the pink pepper, violet, aldehydes, wood and musk that my nose is predominantly smelling.<br />
<br />
It reminds me of a geriatric-aged woman whose hair is still clean, but its been a day or two and the fresh shampoo scent has faded and its almost time she needs another wash n set.<br />
<br />
I was so hoping the just-stepped-out-of-the-shower/laundry scents would have been predominant.<br />
<br />
Its a hard no for me. Not even for an air freshener! Its smells old and dirty to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2321430"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2321430#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314612" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="darkforestmags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1170902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="darkforestmags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DedCool/Milk-67819.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67819.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Milk"title="Milk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314612ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314612" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902">darkforestmags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 13:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Laundry light, clean. Almost more like remnants of a good-smelling deodorant left on clothes. True soap. Smells like a candle. <br />
<br />
This is a very gentle scent. Not really for me, but I will say the cleanliness goes in a different direction than, say, LEau Papier; this veers cooler, a bluer white, a crisp spring day. Its a fine fragrance, but I dont think I could call it unique or particularly interesting. Scents like this are too light for me, have no grounding, theyre just a layer of freshness. <br />
<br />
There does appear to be a little warmth that emerges as it develops, which is nice, but at this point, its just its soap, you guys. Its soap. Just go take a shower.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2314612"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2314612#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Great longevity, though!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2311687"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2311687#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306680" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CaroG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40850"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CaroG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Donna-Born-In-Roma-55805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Donna Born In Roma"title="Valentino Donna Born In Roma"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306680ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306680" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/40850">CaroG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 07:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Some of the commenters below know close to nothing about fragrances, or fragrance history other than what they "heard" on YouTube and TikTok. Blanche is not a new over hyped fragrance. It is close to 20 years old and is the OG clean, laundry type fragrance. When it came out, it was absolutely innovative, a modern take on aldehydes. It still is. It still smells absolutely wonderful. It depends on the vibe you are going for...this isn't a fragrance I would wear on a date, or an evening affair. It is rather an everyday fragrance, perfect for running errands or going to the office. Also, Byredos are not meant to be beast mode. They are known as skin scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2306680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2306680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303094" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303094" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlohafromHawaii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2274295"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlohafromHawaii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303094ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303094" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2274295">AlohafromHawaii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 21:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Please, trust me.<br />
This is my first negative review. <br />
<br />
Its REALLY not good. <br />
Smells like a cheap dryer sheet, lasts about 20 minutes and the dry down is worse<br />
This brand is brought to you by Influencers. <br />
I swear the knock offs online are just originals that over-flooded the market and they are selling for cheap. <br />
Its the least authentic soapy fragrance you can get. <br />
Youll feel like a comforter that should have been re-washed with less detergent while you are at work.<br />
<br />
It weirdly gets more dry and (fake) flowery as it dries down. <br />
<br />
So. Much. Hype. <br />
I wish I could sell this but its going for 1/3 of retail. <br />
And even for $80 Id feel guilty to the next owner. <br />
<br />
I dont even want to give it away for fear of being shamed, later. <br />
Its THAT average.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2303094"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2303094#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300323" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scentmad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/542419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.542419.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scentmad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Portrait-of-a-Lady-10464.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10464.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Portrait of a Lady"title="Portrait of a Lady"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); Nothing more. Its ok if you want to smell like washing I suppose. Not worth the price tag. This just feels like lazy perfumery to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2300323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2300323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298308" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2298308" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scenturian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/12211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.12211.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="scenturian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coromandel-Eau-de-Parfum-41783.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41783.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coromandel Eau de Parfum"title="Coromandel Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2298308ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2298308" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2290289" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iniodar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1195159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iniodar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Mefisto-Gentiluomo-52432.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52432.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mefisto Gentiluomo"title="Mefisto Gentiluomo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2290289ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2290289" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195159">iniodar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-21">09/21/24 07:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I know it's a woman's fragrance, but I like it. Can't go wrong smelling clean, simple, and linear, like the name implies.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2290289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2290289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2283793" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="icerise"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1001214.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="icerise" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2283793ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2283793" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001214">icerise</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 12:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It might be too soapy for me.  Its almost like if you took Chlo EDP apart and isolated the notes or accords, it would be that soapy scent by itself, and it sort of smells good, but its overload of whatever clean profile it wants to capture.  It starts off sharp to my nose and morphs into something masculine-leaning, maybe because of the woody notes and in combination with the violet and aldehydes.  In the dry down, it leaves some sort of sweetness on my skin.  If SJP Lovely and A Drop of DIssey had a baby, it would be this.  It wouldnt be my first choice for a clean scent or a Byredo fragrance, but I can respect why people would put this on their list.  <br />
<br />
Edit:  When I started this review I was totally averse to the smell, but now Ive levelled up to neutral territory.  Maybe its an acquired taste for me.  Not an immediate full-bottle worthyIll give it another chance and see.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2283793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2283793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283350" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2283350" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="faunwand"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1220622.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="faunwand" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clarins/Eau-Ressourcante-2827.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2827.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Ressourcante"title="Eau Ressourcante"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2283350ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2283350" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622">faunwand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 03:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very feminine, rich, soapy floral fragrance. Although I usually spray perfume directly on my skin, this one is an exception. Ive found that it works best when I spray it between my skin and clothes, allowing it to settle. The initial soap notes can be overwhelming but as it dries down, it transforms into a clean, elegant floral scent. Its longevity on clothes is practically eternal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2283350"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2283350#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282614" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282614" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DrDG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180074"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2180074.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DrDG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Orchestre-Parfum/Mono-Cachemire-90484.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90484.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mono Cachemire"title="Mono Cachemire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282614ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282614" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2180074">DrDG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 09:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I purchased a sample of this several months ago, wore it once and thought "it's ok".  Then, yesterday, I decided to try it again.  While I understand why people say that it is a "clean" scent, to me it smelled like bathroom cleaner.  It has a screechy, medicinal quality that I absolutely hated.  After I sprayed it on, I hated the opening - again it smelled like the bathroom cleaner that I use.  But I decided to wait for the dry down. But it did not get any better.  After a couple of hours, I didn't have time to take another shower, so I just sprayed a stronger fragrance over it.  But, Blanche outlasted the stronger fragrance and by the end of the day, I was smothering in this awful bathroom cleaner smell.  Ugh!  No thanks!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2282614"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2282614#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282400" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282400" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="veronodx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1741854"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1741854.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="veronodx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282400ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282400" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1741854">veronodx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-14">09/14/24 06:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>its popular for the clean girlies and i see why you will be the CLEANEST of them girlies thats for sure  pure laundry detergent but somehow sweet? my brain doesnt like that combination. this fragrance is agressive, will never repurchase</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2282400"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2282400#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2282098" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="byrehoe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1577248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1577248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="byrehoe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jouissance/En-Plein-Air-98080.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.98080.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="En Plein Air"title="En Plein Air"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2282098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2282098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1577248">byrehoe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 20:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"Clean girl". Perfume reviewers always use that, don't they? As their defining compliment: "She's a clean girl". Clean girl is cool. Clean girl is game. Clean girl is clean. Clean girl never gets pissy with a skin scent. She only smiles in a crisply-veneered manner. And then presents her mouth for her next nude lip balm du jour. She likes what the trend cycle likes, so evidently shes a costalgrandmother-cottagecore-angelbaby who loves blueberry-milkshake-ozonics. If the cycle likes alpine-tradwife-oldmoney, she's a lactonic-bubblebath-gourmand babe who talks white linen notes and layers with three other vanillas. When I met Blanche I knew I wanted to be "clean girl". And for this scent, I'll admit: I was willing to try. I applied no-makeup makeup. I drank artisanal spring water watching videos of skincare ASMR. I removed all colour from my house and bought a Restoration Hardware cloud couch. I went to reformer pilates, semi regularly. I slept on silk pillowcases. I was fucking game. I can't say I didn't enjoy some of it. <br />
<br />
tl;dr: clean girl </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2282098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2282098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282000" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Still have yet to smell this best of the best though</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2282000"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2282000#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280824" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280824" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jtonarely"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252049"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2252049.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jtonarely" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280824ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280824" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2252049">Jtonarely</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 16:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a lover of clean fragrances I really thought this one would hit all the notes are right up my alley. <br />
<br />
Initial spray reminded me of dusty paper or the smell of an old book which I found interesting. The moment it settled on my skin however I immediately thought of a porta potty or a recently cleaned gas station bathroom. Not a fresh pin-sol scent but literally a moldy mop dipped in dirty synthetic soapy water. Its probably just my skin chemistry because I know so many people love this, but ooooof hard no for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2280824"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2280824#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2278305" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Blanche sounds kind of boring. People describe it as laundry soap, but thats such an understatement. This is the most luxurious, velvety, white, clean, laundry soap to ever exist and so much more. I dont know if its the aldehydes or something else but this fragrance has a very distinct smell like no other. Very unisex too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2278305"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2278305#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2271684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
