I like the simplicity of this scent, but not enough to go full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2270398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2270398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268476" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2268476" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bellalandia"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2091211.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="bellalandia" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Regime-des-Fleurs/Himitsu-72664.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72664.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Himitsu"title="Himitsu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2268476ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2268476" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091211">bellalandia</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 16:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is just fantastic. Clean and fresh but in a warm tone way. Smells like laundry and warm skin (musky in the best way). I didnt think it was revolutionary but it is really hard to find soapy scent like this. It can be worn as everyday perfume and it just makes me feel well put together</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2268476"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2268476#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; very airy, very fresh and very much the epitome of aldehydic:<br />
soapy laundry detergent scent.<br />
blindingly bright sunny mornings.<br />
i would've guessed lavender, not violet.<br />
<br />
but it just leans very "little girl on easter sunday,"<br />
to me and I'm not into it </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2265438"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2265438#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261148" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2250648"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2250648#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243349" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243349" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Keva666"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801059"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Keva666" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243349ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243349" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801059">Keva666</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 21:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Let me preface by saying clean, soapy, freshie perfumes are my jam. I love replicas bubble bath and JHAGs not a perfume. I thought Id love Blanche - Im so so glad I picked up the 10ml size first. <br />
<br />
Blanche is the grandma in the family of fresh &amp; clean fragrances. If Bubble Bath smells like warm, clean skin &amp; fresh laundry, Blanche smells like you stuck your nose into a bottle of laundry detergent in the grocery store. Its just so literal. <br />
<br />
Its not evocative or alluring, its not warm, its totally missing a human-ness to the scent. Just smells like detergent. You might as well buy a dryer sheet and stick it in your pocket. <br />
<br />
This is probably my least enjoyed scent in Byredos entire line. Save your money!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2243349"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2243349#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238267" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2238267" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="daydreamflame79"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2212167"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="daydreamflame79" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2238267ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2238267" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2212167">daydreamflame79</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 23:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh out of the shower scent, doesnt last long which is not great for the price point but still quite lovely if you dont want anything too strong and like the fresh/clean aesthetic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2238267"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2238267#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232001" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232001" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="droidrat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099378"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2099378.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="droidrat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Princess-90174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Princess"title="Princess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232001ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232001" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2099378">droidrat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 13:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>first spray smells like i drenched myself in johnsons baby powder. that goes away after a few seconds and then smells like a little bar of hotel soap sitting by the edge of the sink still wet. Unisex. Theres something in here I dont enjoy- I think its the rose. Lasted about 2-3 hours on my skin</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2232001"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2232001#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2231574" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2231574" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iamkinton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1731287.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iamkinton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2231574ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2231574" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731287">iamkinton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-28">07/28/24 02:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume smells like you're standing in a daisy field, surrounded by little white daisies tickling your legs, embraced by the breeze of sunshine. HOWEVER, it's way overpriced for its simplicity.<br />
<br />
If you have little to no issue with how your money's worth, it's a no-brainer option to include in your collection. I use it during that time of the month and as a nighttime spray because it's lovely and very inoffensive. During my period, I get easily annoyed by heavy perfumes so it's one of my go-to aldehyde options, though unfortunately not the best. I even prefer my $5 local perfume that smells like a cotton blanket on a sunny day and it lasts ALL DAY unlike this perfume.<br />
<br />
In short, when coming into a comparison, it's a meh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2231574"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2231574#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2230011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661">Heliotrope72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 09:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>MBTI: ISFJ, ISTJ<br />
<br />
A bucket of fabric softener. <br />
<br />
Very practical on clothes! If I'm wearing them the 2nd time - given they weren't sweaty - it gives them that freshly washed zzzing~<br />
<br />
On skin - a shame, but no good. <br />
<br />
Potent scent, good for damp and warmer days to indulge in fresh air and the feel of cool, freshly washed linen.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2230011"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2230011#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227639" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; roses.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2226685"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2226685#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2225520" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2225520" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pumpkinprincess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200757"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pumpkinprincess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2225520ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2225520" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2200757">Pumpkinprincess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-21">07/21/24 16:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The initial burst of scent worried me because it smelled quite strong and a bit like laundry scented wax melts but then I got crisp white linen/ soapy vibes, in a nice way. It also has a slightly sun creamy thing going on. As it evolves I get soft, comforting, slightly musky &amp; slightly sweet all blended harmoniously. I cant pick out the notes on their own other than the aldehydes. The smell makes me feel like Im wearing a white shirt and suncream while walking to work/school on a fresh summer morning. Truly beautiful scent with lots of facets to it, its aldehydes but blended in such a beautiful and subtle way. Its cooling &amp; relaxing. I have been reaching for my sample far more than I thought I would! I would buy the full size if only it lasted more than 30 mins! Ive never known a fragrance to have such poor spillage and longevity and for the price Im not willing to reapply it several times a day unfortunately because I really love it but its gone without even a trace within the hour!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2225520"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2225520#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223198" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2223198"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2223198#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2222079" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="L&#039;&eacute;gyptienne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1595463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="L&#039;&eacute;gyptienne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Black-Tie-57925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tie"title="Black Tie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2222079ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2222079" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1595463">L&#039;&eacute;gyptienne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-18">07/18/24 04:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update:<br />
I decided to make my signature scent while traveling and taking flights, but an advice not over spray because it'can lead to an nauseating feelings with the stress of traveling<br />
I love it!!!<br />
It reminds me when i enter my hotel room during a vacation, it is clean, fresh with a slight sweet touch :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2222079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2222079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219374" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219374" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cadentsun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1502149"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1502149.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cadentsun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219374ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219374" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1502149">cadentsun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 12:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is naturally a top perfume of mine because I shamelessly love laundry/shampoo freshies in the vein of Chlo EDP and Replica Lazy Sunday Morning. Byredo Blanche to me is kind of like the optional, true ending, Final final boss in this category of fragrances, because it's such a splurge, and technically I can live with my bottle of Replica that already achieves the same-ish thing with the rose and aldehydes and musk (along with many other cheaper linen spray type fragrances I'm sure).<br />
<br />
But I would say Blanche is really worthwhile for its brightness and clarity. The initial blast of aldehydes evokes natural citrus, and the pink pepper really lends it some sparkle. The performance is very steady for a clean floral blend (in which the florals are taking the backseat). It's fresh, hygienic, yet still a little sweet and soft despite being a decidedly prissy, white-collar scent. I would advise to steer clear if you're wanting more nuance with the florals, or if "astringent" notes can be a problem for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2219374"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2219374#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218604" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is my signature scent. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198001" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lilah_lilah2023"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1767593"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1767593.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lilah_lilah2023" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Duelle-Eau-de-Toilette-9241.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9241.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"title="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198001ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198001" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1767593">Lilah_lilah2023</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 08:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like fresh white flowers. Not very strong, imo, but maybe that's how it's supposed to be. I don't find it remarkable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2198001"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2198001#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185615" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185615" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kiwigoddess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523875"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1523875.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kiwigoddess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185615ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185615" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523875">Kiwigoddess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 00:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is soapy, fabric softenery, clean linen and I'm here for it! There is something so satisfying about putting on freshly laundered clothes and smelling the laundry detergent/fabric softener on them. Blanche gives me that same satisfaction. It's very mild mannered and inoffensive. I didn't find it loud or screechy in any way. It is very safe for any kind of environment. I find equally as comforting during the day as when I go to bed. It's soothing, almost cathartic on a cold wintery night when you're wrapped up snug and warm with your slippers on and cup of hot chocolate in your hands. It gives you that feeling of "all is right in the world", regardless of what is going on outside of your home.<br />
<br />
As much as I love this fragrance, I think it is way overpriced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2185615"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2185615#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182341" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bambilady"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2027141"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2027141.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bambilady" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Delina-43871.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43871.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Delina"title="Delina"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2027141">bambilady</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 15:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like fresh, flowery laundry on a sunny day, giving you that clean, just-washed feeling. super ideal for early mornings, especially during spring. If you are a lover of the scents of fresh linen and delicate flowers, this one's for you!<br />
However, the fragrance doesnt last as long as Id hoped, which is a bit disappointing considering it's price. It genuinely feels as though I'm wearing nothing after a couple of hours It's also not as floral as I initially thought it was. But still, Its a lovely scent for a quick pick-me-up, but I wish it had more staying power.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2182341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2182341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181823" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sharp, clean, harsh soap scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2181823"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2181823#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843316">REINITO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-29">05/29/24 23:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this when I'm traveling, particularly in between long-haul flights, to give myself a little olfactive pick me up and remind myself I am a more or less civilized person. I don't find it to be too feminine. If anything, it is too white. Smells like Gwyneth Paltrow talking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2172067"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2172067#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2170646" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2170646" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KerriZ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1506615.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KerriZ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2170646ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2170646" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1506615">KerriZ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 15:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lovely light scent perfect for a warm summer day.  It reminded me of a water lily Monet painting. Cool and inviting white, pink flowers floating on their bright green pads on top of a gentle blue stream. Close to the skin. Good for when you want to be subtly remembered.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2170646"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2170646#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2165788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165788" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nolan_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2142906"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2142906.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nolan_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2142906">nolan_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 16:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>10/10<br />
that's all. this rendered me speechless. signature worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2165788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2165788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164627" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2164627" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EauDeLa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2072264.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EauDeLa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Duelle-Eau-de-Toilette-9241.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9241.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"title="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2164627ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2164627" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072264">EauDeLa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 15:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Byredo Blanche is positively offensive. No, not because of its scent but because it is a 100% exact dupe of Fresh Laundry by Clean and marked it up 7 times the price. I ordered Blanche (both the perfume and lotion) from Nordstrom having heard it was a beautiful soapy aldehydic treasure. As soon as I sprayed it, I knew I already owned it. It is completely indistinguishable from Clean Laundry, which is about $15 an ounce. <br />
<br />
Is this where we are now in the world of perfume? In complete over-saturation to the point that niche houses are scouring the perfumes at TJ Maxx looking for inspiration? It is getting ridiculous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2164627"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2164627#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162339" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2162339" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BestBohemianLife"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135455"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BestBohemianLife" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2162339ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2162339" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135455">BestBohemianLife</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 14:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you've ever wondered what the world's most sophisticated baby smells like, this is it. Definitely a clean, soapy, laundry-like scent with floral top and middle notes. Dries down quickly to a powdery aroma. Intimate, no sillage to speak of, so good for work or close quarters. But there's a buttoned-up aloofness to it that I don't love. This is a wealthy middle-aged woman (I'm F 62, FWIW) in a loveless marriage who can't let her hair down and wears a uniform of tone-on-tone whites and creams. Heavy "don't touch me" and "I'll do it myself" energy. Bit of a disappointment. And I'm getting an aldehyde headache, I think, about 25 minutes in.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2162339"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2162339#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160095" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chanelnumerocinq"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/136011"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.136011.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chanelnumerocinq" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Black-154.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.154.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black"title="Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/136011">chanelnumerocinq</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 10:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Crystalline aldehydes, soft florals. Very on-the-nose fresh laundry scent. Gives about an inch projection. I can appreciate clean / fresh literality especially with perfumes that smell like soap. I don't know how to feel about this literal laundry detergent/dryer sheet smell. It's well done &amp; pleasant but far too expensive for what it is. I prefer perfumes that give a clean linens vibe but more abstracted and with more lush floral. The florals in Blanche are rather muddled and indistinct, which it has in common with commercial cleansing products. Would be good for work.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2160095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2160095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153657" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Hard-edged soap. One of my "I'm all-business" favorites, pairs well with starchy button downs, vantablack pants, and sculptural heels.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2153657"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2153657#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2150487" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Im usually not heavy on pepper or white florals but this perfume is just so beautiful and addictive. I didnt expect to like this at all from the notes but its definitely up there with my favorites.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2144800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2144800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2142715" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's light and clean. Not something I would reach for, but does not repel me either. It is kind of a like a laundry detergent smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2142715"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2142715#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2137581" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2137581" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="questionmark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1661691"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1661691.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="questionmark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/754-20193.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20193.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="754"title="754"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2137581ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2137581" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1661691">questionmark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 20:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a 1:1 for H&amp;Ms Above the Clouds if you want an affordable dupe if they even sell it anymore. I initially bought the fragrance because I heard it had similar notes to Glossier You, but Im afraid the only<br />
Similarities it carries are the violet and musk. I dont smell the pink peppercorn or the woodiness. It is a clean scent and I almost get a fresh fruity light whiff of pear but maybe my mind is deceiving me. Its a scent you wear on a bright spring day in a white tee and jeans running errands. Beautiful clean scent nonetheless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2137581"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2137581#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2135606" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2135261"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2135261#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128980" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128980" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="odorteca"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1827306"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1827306.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="odorteca" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128980ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128980" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1827306">odorteca</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 18:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Modern architecture, minimalism, newly released Apple electronics, white marble, fresh snow, porcelain tiles, crystal chandelier, panoramic windows, clean and ironed white clothes - 'Blanche' evoked all these images and associations in me when I wore it, and it successfully delivers what it promises.<br />
<br />
It is a modern floral-aldehyde, a reinterpretation of this perfumery genre that was born in 1921 with Chanel N5 and which declined in popularity over the decades: while classic aldehyde florals use the molecules to give a bright floral notes with a warm/animalic base, Blanche simplifies, or rather, minimalizes this structure, making the aldehydes its main star - an absurdly clean, bright perfume, almost bordering on aseptic, fresh, icy, dry, metallic.<br />
<br />
The rose, peony and violet are evident, but they are not "in natura", reminiscent of a garden, they more resemble the feeling of being in a modern glass vase in a chic living room. The aldehydes do not cease for even a moment, leaving an aroma reminiscent of freshly ironed clothes, washing powder, soap, soap bubbles and an infinite number of clean and white things.<br />
<br />
Excellent logevity, very good sillage. It can be used all year round, even in hot weather in controlled doses. Elegant, versatile, appropriate, harmless. Great perfume to be a signature.<br />
<br />
(P.S: Toy 2 is very similar, but softer and friendlier than Blanche).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2128980"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2128980#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126830" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126830" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="perfumepearl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1792886"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="perfumepearl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Not-A-Perfume-10296.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10296.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Not A Perfume"title="Not A Perfume"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126830ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126830" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); The price is crazy but the oil roller is not that expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2126830"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2126830#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118015" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118015" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brainrot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1394823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="brainrot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118015ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118015" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394823">brainrot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 06:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>on my skin it's a gorgeous lactonic fragrance, not overly sweet, not too 'clean' a scent, but certainly light and soft</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2118015"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2118015#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115190" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115190" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Erika.Lane"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723867"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1723867.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Erika.Lane" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Althair-84109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Althar"title="Althar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115190ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115190" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2115190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2115190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2097231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2097231" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Johnny Madison"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1889501"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1889501.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Johnny Madison" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Andrea-Maack/Soft-Tension-39036.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39036.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Soft Tension"title="Soft Tension"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2097231ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2097231" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1889501">Johnny Madison</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-19">03/19/24 07:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Quite possibly one of the most addictive fragrances in my collection, to the point where I found myself wanting everything with this scent from the lotion, body cream, hair perfume...I can't get enough. The only unfortunate thing about Blanche is that it seems that I am the only one that can appreciate it among my circle of people. Friends always tell me that I smell like a bar of soap or that I perhaps may have used too much detergent in my last load of laundry, but to me this is something so uplifting and magical. Ethereal, angelic, so perfectly delicate and unassuming; blanche is uncomplicated but gorgeous. I believe it is very difficult to blend aldehydes into a perfume to where it doesn't take center stage and make a fragrance icy cold or too synthetic smelling, but Blanche has accomplished bringing in aldehydes so perfectly to where it is modern and balanced... This is great for the office or wearing before slipping into your slumber. <br />
Blanche is kind and approachable and I will always have a place in my heart for her.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2097231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2097231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2087221" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2087221" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Msala140"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1787860"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1787860.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Msala140" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Addict-Eau-de-Parfum-2014-28201.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28201.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Addict Eau de Parfum (2014)"title="Dior Addict Eau de Parfum (2014)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2087221ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2087221" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1787860">Msala140</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-09">03/09/24 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a pretty , fresh scent. The aldehydes are modern, and give it this laundry touch to it , not like warm like opening up a washer/dryer but just the clean scent of the dryer sheet but its its cool and airy due to the violet, which gives it also a light powderines. I dont get much rose but Im glad because Im pretty much over rose, everything has rose is in nowadays . Breezy, clean, and fuzzy . Perfect for summer and spring</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2087221"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2087221#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084121" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
