But if you dont, you will smell like strong soap/laundry detergent to them. <br />
Not a lot of depth with this scent even though there are lots of ingredients listed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2083995"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2083995#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081851" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="theperfumegirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1278005"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="theperfumegirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081851ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081851" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1278005">theperfumegirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 09:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was hoping to get the laundry detergent smell as some people have mentioned thats what it smells like and I quite like clean scents but this smells like straight up soap. The smell is OK but its quite sharp at first and I dont think Id like to smell like soap especially at this price tag. I would say it lasts around 3-4 hours before it becomes a skin scent and after 4 hours I can smell some sweetness, it kind of reminds me of Lush Snow Fairy, but this bit only lasts about 1.5 hours before the scent completely disappears. If this was cheaper Id wear it to the gym or somewhere where loud perfumes were inappropriate. I wont think about this fragrance again theres lots of cheaper alternatives if I really wanted to smell like this which I doubt I will. 3/5 overall because its just meh</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2081851"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2081851#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081751" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081751" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Smellywaterlover"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2043431"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2043431.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Smellywaterlover" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081751ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081751" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2043431">Smellywaterlover</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong laundry detergent scent. I like the scent but not as a perfume. I only use this to spray my curtains to make my room smell nice and clean. There are plenty of clean-smelling fragrances out there, but this is too expensive for what it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2081751"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2081751#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2076439" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2076439" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sammy134"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036319"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sammy134" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2076439ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2076439" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036319">Sammy134</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-28">02/28/24 00:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Had a travel size from the Le Selection set. I heard people said it smell like laundry and I thought thats crazy. I was definitely surprised.<br />
<br />
It unironically does smell like it if you think about it long enough. As its drying down its reminding me of Tide powder detergent, not the liquid, the old school powder. But like in a good way, not aggressive, except the first moment after spraying was a bit of a headache with alcohol and aldehyde - but its Aldehyde fragrance so Im not surprised.<br />
<br />
To be honest, I dont smell any wood or Orange Blossom like the Middle and base suggested. Its Aldehyde with a bit of rose and powdery from the Violet. <br />
<br />
I couldnt see myself wearing this seriously but I have been spraying it on my shirt then let it dry out a bit while I get dressed with other things and it definitely makes my clothes smells fresh and out of the laundry even though it probably was out of the laundry for days now.<br />
<br />
Overall, get it on discount or travel set, blind buy will be disappointing if youre just purely looking at the notes. And its true, it smells like laundry. <br />
<br />
P/S I dont know if the full size is like this but the atomizer on the travel bottle is so fine and smooth, could barely feel it hits my skin if it wasnt for the alcohol</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2076439"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2076439#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2075901" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Eventually, it became more ozonic and pleasant but I would not wear this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2075901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2075901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066111" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2066111" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShowMustGoOn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345775"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345775.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShowMustGoOn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/White-Suede-6386.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6386.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Suede"title="White Suede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2066111ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2066111" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345775">ShowMustGoOn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 08:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you want a good laundry scent get Lazy Sunday Morning from Margiela. This one is subpar and not worth the $</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2066111"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2066111#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061498" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2061498" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LomaAroma"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LomaAroma" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2061498ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2061498" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1963804">LomaAroma</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-13">02/13/24 19:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Based on the reviews I really wanted to love this fragrance, and I did love it- for about the first five minutes.  The first five minutes were amazing.  Nothing short of amazing.  Almost like a soap made for babies.  Outstanding.  Then it dries down to something atrocious and I just don't understand.  I had the same experience with Bal D'Afrique in that, the opening was incredible, then it dries down so bad.  I've only tried those two from this house and have been disappointed both times.  It makes me sad.  If they would eliminate whatever is in the base that causes that god-awful stench after dry-down, this fragrance would be in my top five favorites. I am going to let this sit for about 30 days and see if there's any difference.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2061498"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2061498#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058989" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058989" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tericarl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1449170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tericarl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058989ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058989" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1449170">Tericarl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-11">02/11/24 08:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received the byredo sampler and I loved the other two. This one gave me immediate memories to individuals masking cigarette scents with fragrance. My guess its the laundry freshness and maybe theres something in this scent that was similar to febreeze but everytime I smelled it I got smoker mom* memories.<br />
<br />
That being said- I had a lot of those memories while wearing this so it has a long wear and decent sillage. If the fragrance doesnt give you weird memories or brings out the right notes on your skin, you can trust its a solid fragrance for longevity.<br />
<br />
*no criticism to smoking mom- it just gave me that scent memory of being in friends cars or houses when their moms smoked.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2058989"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2058989#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058513" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058513" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="churinl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/731667"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.731667.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="churinl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-Dusita/Rosarine-80375.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.80375.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rosarine"title="Rosarine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058513ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058513" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/731667">churinl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 17:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first experience with Byredo, and won't be the last. I love it's freshness and light floralcy. The only thing that prevents this from being a love for me is it's dismal longevity and complete lack of sillage. Even heavy spraying does little to change it, and the only way to even have an intimate skin scent is with frequent reapplication. This is far too expensive to use in that way.<br />
I've accepted the fact that even niche perfumes frequently suffer from poor longevity, but this is so poor, I don't think I will ever repurchase. That said, there are many others in the range that I want to try, so I'm not going to write the brand off yet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2058513"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2058513#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058351" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yukikiki"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1527214"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1527214.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yukikiki" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058351ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058351" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1527214">yukikiki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 14:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Agreeing with the person who said it smells like bathroom cleaner. I was looking for a heaven's gate fragrance I smelled on someone. Wasn't courageous enough to ask. But it wasn't this.<br />
<br />
Very sharp, too sharp. It does have a laundry sort of vibe to it. Buy I suppose they added too much of something and it veered off into bathroom cleaner, the astringent one used in women's public bathrooms. <br />
<br />
I'm sorry, there are way better laundry scents for a better price. Also agree with the same user that sometimes I want to smell like Tide. <br />
<br />
For those looking for a clean laundry-like scent, go for Lazy Sunday Morning, I don't gravitate towards that one but it's certainly better than Blanche.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2058351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2058351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058318" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ettenig sayam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1988126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ettenig sayam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Amaali-48222.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48222.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amaali"title="Amaali"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1988126">ettenig sayam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 13:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blanche by Byredo. I like this fragrance. I won't say it was or is "love at first sniff," but it has grown on me. It reminds me of laundered white sheets drying in the sun after a day of rain and wind. It' clean - not in a soapy way, but in a natural way. I would wear this to an early morning Pilates or yoga class  or even to the gym. It's the kind of spa-like scent you enjoy after you have enjoyed a sauna and a shower and you put clean dry clothes. It reminds me of fjords of Norway. If they had a smell, it would be Blanche by Byredo. It's a cozy scent to wear on a cold blustery day when you snuggle into your pajamas and enjoy a rice bowl on your couch watching some fascinating Netflix movie. To me it's full bottle worthy. It's a keeper. Perfect for the quiet office, a gym meet-up, or people who work in stinky environments and want a whiff of a clean crisp fragrance. 9/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2058318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2058318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2051471" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is what Princess Peach would smell like if she was having a bad day at the laundromat</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2047190"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2047190#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2043840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2043840" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="booksandcats457"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447947"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="booksandcats457" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aerin/Lilac-Path-19057.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.19057.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lilac Path"title="Lilac Path"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2043840ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2043840" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447947">booksandcats457</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-27">01/27/24 13:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unfortunately I am one of the people who gets straight up laundry detergent/dryer sheets from this. It literally smells just like I rubbed my wrists with dryer sheets. Dont get me wrong, its not a bad scent by any means! Its very clean, crisp, and soapy. Very reminiscent of clean linens or a freshly laundered t-shirt. I think this would be perfect for work for that reason (it doesnt read as overtly perfume-y and thus would be unlikely to offend), and thats probably where I will wear the rest of my sample, to the office. But this isnt special or unique enough for me to consider shelling out for a bottle, especially at Byredo prices.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2043840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2043840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2042160" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670870">Sophia97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-25">01/25/24 22:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a warm and cozy fragrance for me. I really like it when I wear this fragrance, like I feel fresh and super clean after wearing it. But one thing that bothered me was that after the dry down it got too soapy which was too much for me, and just because of this thing, it made me looked for a fragrance similar to this, in which I came across White Beauty by Dua fragrances and it smelled HEAVENLY! It's the exact smelling fragrance but exactly how I want! in price and in smell. Amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2042160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2042160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2041042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2041042" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nichoa99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1846366"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1846366.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nichoa99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Liquides-Imaginaires/Blanche-Bete-70189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanche Bte"title="Blanche Bte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2041042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2041042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1846366">nichoa99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-24">01/24/24 17:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love clean scents, and this one is very nice. It smells more like a laundro-mat, a little bit of a generic metallic-powdery smell. This one is definitely more on the detergent side, and more literal. This doesn't have any bleach smell to it, or chlorine. If you know any perfumes that do, send me a message!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2041042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2041042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038286" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038286" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="solulszabolcs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1938205"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="solulszabolcs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038286ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038286" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); Very clean. Loveable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2038286"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2038286#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2034995" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2034995" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tsmarcondes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832458"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1832458.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tsmarcondes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Sultry-Pear-Eau-de-Parfum-81571.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81571.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sultry Pear Eau de Parfum"title="Sultry Pear Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2034995ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2034995" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832458">Tsmarcondes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 15:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like a soap from a really expensive hotel. A good one, fresh, reminds you of those super white clean sheets or a super clean toilet. Yeah, clean is the word and as I really like this kind of smell, I would wear it eventually but I'm not willing to pay this price, no sir, so forget about it.<br />
<br />
Edit: Toy 2 from Moschino is exactly the same for a fraction of the price. I'm going after it, for the days I just want to smell like straight out of the shower.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2034995"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2034995#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033226" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There is some kind of self-satisfaction which is being felt after taking a shower and that only comes after smelling yourself or if anyone compliments, oh you smell so nice after shower or says you smell so fresh (when you're all damp) though this scent is kind of that one, like if I wanted to refresh myself without taking shower, then this is my go-to fragrance in the morning. It's definitely a clean soapy scent but oh man, not taking shower is costing me too much and I am unable to afford it more. Is there any similar scent to this which would suit my budget i.e. around 80 dollars?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2033226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2033226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2024250" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1905422">Powerfulpatchouli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-06">01/06/24 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For fans of the aldehydes of Channel no5 but wanting a lighter, fizzier floral for warm weather. Perfect for wedding guests, when your friend with excellent tastes has the most romantic garden wedding in the Spring. Leaving the boss perfume at home you are relaxed and joyful and planning on getting drunk for free on well chosen champagne. Would also suit older brides. The type who knows herself. She is past the girlishness of a Delina but is giddy with excitement and love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2022831"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2022831#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017492" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017492" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SeauxGood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246921"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246921.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SeauxGood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zadig-Voltaire/This-is-Her-39358.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39358.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="This is Her"title="This is Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017492ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017492" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246921">SeauxGood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 23:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to agree with those saying this smells like laundry detergent. Mind you, not like clothes that have been freshly washed, but like the liquid itself. I could see wearing this to the gym or to freshen up my uniform during a restaurant servers shift. Not exactly something that justifies paying this price point. You can get this same effect with Clean Warm Cotton or Clean Fresh Laundry. Besides, Id rather my clean and fresh fragrances smell like actual perfumes, not like cleaning agents. Overall, this doesnt smell bad; its just unnecessary.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2017492"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2017492#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2016254" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2016254" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MissStarE1973"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427924"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1427924.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MissStarE1973" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Stella-McCartney/Sheer-Stella-2006-604.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.604.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sheer Stella 2006"title="Sheer Stella 2006"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2016254ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2016254" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427924">MissStarE1973</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-31">12/31/23 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is straight-up clean laundry to me. While that's ordinarily not a bad thing, I don't necessarily want my perfume to smell like that. I don't smell roses or any florals as mentioned in the perfumers notes. Just laundry detergent. I can't figure out if I like it or not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2016254"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2016254#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012321" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Supernova07"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194932"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1194932.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Supernova07" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Roses-Vanille-15210.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15210.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Roses Vanille"title="Roses Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1194932">Supernova07</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-27">12/27/23 13:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with all those who characterize this scent as clean laundry. It has a soapy, detergent-like quality that is definitely not for everyone. It's a nice fragrance for those white t-shirt and jeans days or whenever you skip the shower and still want to smell clean. I think this is a unisex scent, but it is not a safe blind buy. While I enjoy the scent, the price tag prevents me from considering it FB worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="2012321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=2012321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2005766" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; But at the same time like an auntie in the Y2K</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1995332"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1995332#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1993739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1993739" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="abcdefgeps"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1886774"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="abcdefgeps" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1993739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1993739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1886774">abcdefgeps</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 02:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you don't like perfumes with aldehydes, steer clear of this one. The aldehydes in this is very strong.<br />
<br />
I love it only because it triggers fun childhood memories. It takes me back to being a little kid in school in the morning hanging out with other kids, all showered and drenched in different colognes.<br />
<br />
Will I repurchase a bottle? No. It's too pricey for what it is. I might just settle into using my current one sparingly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1993739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1993739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1990251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I really enjoy this scent it makes me smell clean and feel put together when I wear it. This is the ultimate high end designer white t shirt kinda smell. Sure its over priced but its so versatile that I am making a decent dent in it which is no small feat for an avid perfume collector.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; The first time i smelled Blanche i didnt get it nor liked it but still decided to get it. And i Love it! It is very clean, laundry type of clean, pale sunny mornings, fancy hotel linnen, genuine winks, white undies and hugs in funfairs.<br />
</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1983746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1983746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978230" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1978230" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spaceybailey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1800427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1800427.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spaceybailey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1978230ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1978230" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1800427">spaceybailey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-16">11/16/23 13:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells beautiful. Very clean and fresh. But not a laundry scent. Something you would spray the teddy bears on your bed with. A more sophisticated Mr. Bubble original bubble bath. Sweet but not too sweet, fresh and long lasting. Great for your kids closet, to keep their clothes smelling fresh. Powdery, but not like baby powder. I personally wouldn't wear this. I actually love this on my FUR baby. I spray her clothes with Blanche because it has a bougie grooming SALON vibe to it. One spray is all it takes to keep all her cute outfits smelling amazing. The perfect cuddle perfume. BISOUS</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1978230"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1978230#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1974785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1973922" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bbyevrm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1657946"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1657946.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bbyevrm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Devotion-84951.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84951.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Devotion"title="Devotion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1973922ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1973922" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/997121">TuesdayTaylor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-08">11/08/23 12:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love clean scents but this one is just too synthetic.  It smells like the cheap hand soap used in fast food restaurants.  It even kind of smells like the cleaner they use to mop the floors with.  Its not pretty, its not warm, its not fresh, its just a cheap industrial cleaner.  Anything from the CLEAN brand would be a better choice than this.  Or even Philosophys Pure Grace.  Right now my favorite clean scent is Nemats Amber oil.  </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1971901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1971901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1968930" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1753541">cgaleb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-02">11/02/23 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blanche is too strong on the clean laundry detergent scent and my skin doesnt pick up on any of the other notes. I definitely went into this sample thinking I would love this perfume, but it doesnt change at all over the course of the wear for me and I cant get behind all of these aldehydes and nothing else on my skin. Sadly, not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1967229"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1967229#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1959517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1959517" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="isha2003"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1837661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1837661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="isha2003" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1959517ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1959517" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1837661">isha2003</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-24">10/24/23 04:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love my fresh scents, this smelt like clean laundry. this is a professional scent, i imagine a very fine person with formal casual wear (white top, black pants), walking past me at an airport, i can sense they probably fly business/first class, cause this smells expensive. Someone who is successful, a well put together person. <br />
<br />
This is a safe scent, yes it smells good, but do you love it or just like it or just think its ok? a fine line to deciding whether you want this or not, cause it is expensive. i would personally buy this just to smell like clean laundry, but i wouldn't wear this on a day you are looking rough, you won't wear the fragrance well. <br />
<br />
You get this sparkliness with a cloud, and this tone of light blue. although people say its warm and cozy, i would say it's quite opposite cause its crisp, there is this coldness to it. but you would wear this on a sunny day/early morning. overall i rate this an 8/10. although i love this scent, just cause of the price and weak performance.<br />
<br />
<br />
edit: after wearing this for sometime, i realised it reminds me of a very clean bathroom, i have a faint memory of Singapore airport ladies washrooms smelling like this, its a soapy clean scent in a good way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Like a commercial of white linens blowing in the breeze on a clothesline on a sunny cloudless day. Like a bright white bathroom with shiny white tiles. I do like the scent but maybe not as a perfume.
