padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1951269" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tanss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476310"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1476310.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tanss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1951269ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1951269" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1476310">tanss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-13">10/13/23 18:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the perfect clean scent. Smells clean without being soapy. Very gentle, low projection, low longevity. Don't understand the comparison to Toy 2. Blanche absolutely lacks the obvious apple in the opening of Toy 2. Cant seem to understand the similarity. Toy 2 seems to me more of a shampoo vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1951269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1951269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949214" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1949214" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pheebana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740644"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740644.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pheebana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1949214ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1949214" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740644">pheebana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-11">10/11/23 07:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>May I paint you a picture?<br />
 I close my eyes and Im on a road trip. I have just stopped to take a pee and Im washing my hands with generic pink soap. I am standing at a sink in a gas station bathroom. A relatively clean gas station bathroom. But still. The florescent lighting makes me look like actual garbage, makes everything around me look washed out and miserable, and the smells surrounding me do nothing but make me want to leave and never come back. Do I really look like that? (No). There is a crappy hand dryer that will swirl the gas station bathroom air all around me without drying my hands. I will smell like that pink soap for the next hour and it will remind me of that specific gas station bathroom smell. That specific gas station bathroom feeling. It is what it is. <br />
<br />
All I get from Blanche is gas station bathroom. I would feel disgusting wearing this. Perfume really do be subjective, huh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1949214"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1949214#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1939713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1939713" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emily385"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833811"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="emily385" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1939713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1939713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833811">emily385</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-28">09/28/23 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I, personally, really enjoyed this scent when I tested it, but it's not something you would want to overspray</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1939713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1939713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1932307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1932307" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JmThms"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1293565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JmThms" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escada/Escada-pour-Homme-1364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escada pour Homme"title="Escada pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1932307ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1932307" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1293565">JmThms</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-19">09/19/23 20:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A minimalistic fresh and clean Aldehydic scent. Aldehydes controlled enough for my enjoyment. Not like the extremely harsh raw Aldehydic bomb Pikovaya Dama by Xerjoff, in that the aldehydes are softened pretty well by the florals and aromatics. Pikovaya Dama is like an industrial strength cleaner inserted directly into the nostrils. Blanche isn't like that, but it IS predominantly Aldehydic, and so people who are especially sensitive to aldehydes may not like it. I like it. Its in the realm of a "not a perfume" fragrance, for those people who are stuck between not wanting to wear anything and wanting to wear <br />
SOMETHING. I thought it was a whisper in the opening and so sprayed more trying to <br />
compensate. I shouldn't have because it started <br />
radiating those clean aldehydes as it approached the mid, and it actually nauseated me a little. Ironically for a "not a perfume" fragrance,  it's best to control your sprays with this. It's in the neighborhood of a Musc Invisible by JHAG and Lazy Sunday Morning by Maison Martin Margiela. Nice office scent. Unisex. Still my favorite of this house is Bal d'Afrique and Pulp. I like Bal d'Afrique more than Blanche because of the beauty of its composition - florals, citrus, aromatics. Blanche is overwhelmingly Aldehydic,  which gives it a harsh, although clean, edge.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1932307"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1932307#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929496" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="isierra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1472916.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="isierra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6686.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanche"title="Blanche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929496ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929496" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472916">isierra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-16">09/16/23 12:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This genuinely starts off smelling like a sprite soda. The dry down is more of a Powderly citrus floral. Not my favorite.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1929496"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1929496#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927999" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Disappointed to say the least.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1923253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1923253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1915730" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WitchQueen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WitchQueen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1915730ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1915730" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970">WitchQueen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-30">08/30/23 18:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>3.5/10 Another expensive laundry detergent, this time with piss poor longevity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1915730"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1915730#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915562" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1915562" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="toosimilar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1533225"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1533225.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="toosimilar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1915562ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1915562" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1533225">toosimilar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-30">08/30/23 14:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Does anyone know the note giving nauseating in all frags like that?<br />
The one which is slightly sweet, fruity somewhere in the background<br />
I hate to hear "it's a fresh, clean perfume", it's not.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1915562"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1915562#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1910406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; My ex had Acqua Di Gioia, and it was 9-10 years ago, and this reminded me of that perfume. I might be tripping cuz it was long ago. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1899992" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="soctafianto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1529910"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1529910.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="soctafianto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1899992ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1899992" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1529910">soctafianto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-11">08/11/23 21:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a blind buy, like most of my collections. Initially bought as gift for my wife by recommendation from the seller. I was reluctant as rose is the main note and afraid it will will overwhelm other notes. But to her nose she said this is unisex. The soapy and powdery notes will blend with the rose and the first impression is like you just took a nice, very nice bath. <br />
<br />
She is absolutely right. And now I also use this one to myself. And it lasts like forever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1899992"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1899992#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1898532" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1898532" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Flared Maple"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374273"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1374273.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Flared Maple" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Slava-Zaitsev/Maroussia-1196.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1196.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Maroussia"title="Maroussia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1898532ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1898532" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374273">Flared Maple</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-10">08/10/23 05:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like you just took a nice bath in an industrial sized vat of laundry detergent.<br />
<br />
and Im honestly here for it. <br />
<br />
Pinnacle of office-safe fragrances.<br />
Also, really great as an amplifier to any freshies you have in your collection.<br />
I love layering this with Dior Blooming Bouquet, Byredo Mojave Gohst, or Moschino I Love Love to name a few.<br />
Goes great with anything floral or fruity really. Gives those fragrances a unique BURST of clean freshness and seems to amp up the sillage of whatever I layer on top.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1898532"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1898532#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1898470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1898470" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vellocet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490876"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1490876.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vellocet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Dama-Bianca-15555.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15555.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dama Bianca"title="Dama Bianca"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1898470ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1898470" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1490876">Vellocet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-10">08/10/23 04:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Of all the clean fragrances out there, Blanche is the cleanest of them all. It really do smells like fresh and crisp laundry that has been drying in the sun. Luckily the aldehydes are faint here, and quickly disappears to give space to the musk, the powdery violet and peony. I love it, no doubt. But the longevity isn't great. After four hours it's almost completely gone, and for that price tag it's simply not worth it. Dossier has a great dupe called "musky aldehydes", and in my opinion they seriously are identical! Above the cloud from H&amp;M is very similar too! I'd definitely recommend you to try dossier or h&amp;m:s before thinking of buying this. I don't agree that toy2 is that similar though, they just share the same vibes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1898470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1898470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1894229" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Elevated dryer sheets but still.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1894229"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1894229#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1891901" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1791770">Wearwolf56</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-01">08/01/23 12:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The definition of an "office safe" perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1891901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1891901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1888162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1888162" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Julietrenoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801708"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Julietrenoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1888162ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1888162" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801708">Julietrenoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-27">07/27/23 08:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I LOVE it!!! <br />
<br />
Do you know the amazing feeling when you go to sleep into freshly clean sheets after having a shower? It feels like a CUDDLE to me.<br />
<br />
TBH, the first time I tried it, I HATED it! It felt too soapy-clean-detergent like, it gave me the idea of a person that is obsessed with cleaning the house all day long.<br />
They gave me a sample, I tried it again and..it smells BEAUTIFUL on my skin. Yes, it smells like clean, but not only... it smells like violet, musk, and more.. I feel nice, clean, neat, fresh, ready to go!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1888162"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1888162#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1888022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1887342" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lollo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/640429"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lollo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1887342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1887342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1887342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1887342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1887266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1887266" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Baltabarin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1751884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1751884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Baltabarin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/Hermann-a-mes-Cotes-me-Paraissait-une-Ombre-34730.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34730.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermann  mes Cts me Paraissait une Ombre"title="Hermann  mes Cts me Paraissait une Ombre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1887266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1887266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1751884">Baltabarin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-26">07/26/23 04:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's easy to understand why Blanche is a best-seller by Byredo; it's essentially a fresh and clean perfume with a subtle sweetness. I don't think there's anyone in the world who could find it truly unpleasant.<br />
<br />
Personally, it evokes the olfactory landscape of a luxury resort: bright, serene, and comfortable. On warm skin, it can take on the character of a sun lotion, losing a bit of its refined simplicity.<br />
<br />
That being said, it's in line with Byredo's style; a pleasant and polite fragrance, well-composed but reassuringly unexciting. It's a good blind buy for everyday wear and a gift that is almost certain to be appreciated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1887266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1887266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1885840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1885840" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jjeongeun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378703"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378703.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jjeongeun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1885840ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1885840" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); I expected very strong powder detergent <br />
but it is just a normal powdery floral scent.<br />
I'm sad that I couldn't feel the cotton-like smell on this.<br />
I have both Blanche and Boy2. <br />
It's quite similar with the Boy2 but Boy2 is sweeter and cheaper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1885840"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1885840#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1881818" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881818" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Giselecharlotte"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1390820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1390820.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Giselecharlotte" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881818ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881818" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); But no, not even close, and im so relieved because this has become an easy reach. It is quite glorious.<br />
<br />

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881599" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="valentina.marini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/191869"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.191869.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="valentina.marini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Yara-76880.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76880.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yara"title="Yara"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881599ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881599" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/191869">valentina.marini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-18">07/18/23 14:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>nah. can't believe the hype around this one fr! yes, it smells like a fabric detergent, the one that smells cheap and bad and now you have washed all your clothes with it and wearing them is unbearable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1881599"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1881599#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1881074" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881074" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ForTheLoveOfFrag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1787408"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1787408.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ForTheLoveOfFrag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/724-75754.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75754.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="724"title="724"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881074ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881074" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1787408">ForTheLoveOfFrag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-17">07/17/23 20:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've never had anything like this before. Based on the name and description, I was expecting something totally different. I love clean, white, minimalist frags like Lake &amp; Skye 11:11, Lazy Sunday Morning, JHAG Not a Perfume. I gifted mine to a girlfriend and she positively LOVES it. I don't know if it's my skin chemistry or my smell receptors, but, on me there is no florals, no musk, no sandalwood, no development. It is ALL aldehydes. So much so that it doesn't smell clean, it smells like a hospital. Sterile is the word. I was so disappointed and I gave it a fair shake too! Different temps, different times of the month and it always came out the same. It's a shame, it's the one Byredo that lasts forever on my skin. <br />
<br />
It sounds like a safe blind buy, but I would def sample this first.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1881074"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1881074#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1877197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1877197" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luanneog"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1740949.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="luanneog" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1877197ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1877197" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1740949">luanneog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-12">07/12/23 13:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, peppery and a very inoffensive rose. Maybe I got a bad batch or something because to me it mostly smelled like a nail salon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1877197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1877197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1876006" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1876006" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LauraKay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1590262"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1590262.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LauraKay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1876006ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1876006" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1590262">LauraKay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-11">07/11/23 03:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont usually gravitate towards aldehylic scents and the first time I smelled this I actually hated it. I thought it was too harsh and felt it almost burned my nose. But about a year later I revisited it and had a completely different experience. This time I felt the opening was fresh and crisp - exactly like a fresh, just washed white shirt. And the drydown was what really captivated me. On my skin the drydown is super pleasant, musky, slightly floral, gentle and calming. This is now one of my absolute favourite scents. It makes me feel put together, cool and relaxed. Love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1876006"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1876006#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866780" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1866780" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bangingmrsnick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1436364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bangingmrsnick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1866780ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1866780" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1436364">bangingmrsnick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-28">06/28/23 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For like 90% of the day I forgot I was wearing this, but every now then I'd think "Oh! What smells good?" then realize it was me. Then it'd disappear again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1866780"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1866780#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1865594" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1865594" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LSAUG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324444"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LSAUG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Avon/Rare-Emeralds-15690.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15690.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rare Emeralds"title="Rare Emeralds"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1865594ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1865594" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324444">LSAUG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-27">06/27/23 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have been curious about Blanche for quite a while now and finally decided to test it.  It is polarizing and I can understand why because aldehydic perfumes usually are.   It reminds me of a toned-down version of Estee Lauder's White Linen.  That perfume is wayyy to much and I usually hate "laundry" type perfumes, but Blanche does this type of scent in a pitch perfect way.  It is neither to strong nor to soft.  This would be a beautiful scent to wash your cashmere sweaters or silks blouses in.  Soapy aldehydes combined w/ a faint cloud of pink and purple synthetic flowers that are pretty the way faux pearls are pretty.  This is a good signature type of scent for those who want to smell clean, ladylike, and nondescript.  It is classy but in a postmodern way.  It shares nothing in common w/ Chanel no 5 or White Diamonds.  Those perfumes are much more voluptuous and sensual than Blanche.  They are a power move; out for seduction, Blanche just hums along, she is nice and kind of pretty, but she isn't looking for attention, she is happy to just go w/ the flow.    It is a new type of aldehyde for millennials and possibly Gen Z.   I do not understand the high price tag and I won't buy a full bottle of it because of that.  I would rather buy Chanel's and Guerlain's that are on my want shelf instead and surprisingly ounce per ounce they are quite a bit cheaper.  This is the only scent from Byredo that has interested me enough to test.  I cannot understand their justification for such high prices for all synthetic creations.  But they must sell because I never see their perfumes at discounters so they must be very successful.  But I can also understand someone falling head over heels for this and buying it for the asking price.  It is unique at least to my nose and again it has that postmodern style that will appeal to the young who want a 'vintage' scent but can't tolerate a true vintage aldehydic perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1865594"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1865594#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1857222" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1857222" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marieberd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1734943"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1734943.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marieberd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Stora-Skuggan/Mistpouffer-58437.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58437.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mistpouffer"title="Mistpouffer"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1857222ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1857222" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1734943">marieberd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-15">06/15/23 15:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>laundry and that's it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1857222"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1857222#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1854255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1854255" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LeighaCece"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1755565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LeighaCece" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1854255ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1854255" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1755565">LeighaCece</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-11">06/11/23 18:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I first smelled this, it was like a nostril assault. I sprayed a little bit of the sample on my forearm and was like "oh nope, I'm wearing something else today" and over-sprayed a totally different perfume on my wrists and pulse points...and then kept getting whiffs of clean laundry. I kept sniffing my wrists and was like "hmm no that's not it" but was convinced that someone around me smelled like they just jumped out of a dryer full of freshly cleaned linen. I finally pulled up my sleeve and smelled my forearm and realized it was THIS. Even though the initial spray smelled like bathroom cleaner, it must have quickly dried down to a lovely clean, fresh laundry scent. I've been looking for a "dryer sheet" type clean scent and this is IT. It smells like MMM Lazy Sunday Morning and MMM Bubble Bath had a baby (those are also two of my faves). Once you get past the shocking aldehydes top note, it's totally worth it. My boyfriend smelled it on me several hours later (like, 12) and asked if I plugged a "fresh" plug in on my side of the bed or washed the bedsheets in a new detergent. Perfect "clean girl" scent if you're really looking for that clean laundry perfume (with soapy floral notes!)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1854255"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1854255#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853449" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1853449" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dhcoalition"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209300"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="dhcoalition" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-Man-920.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.920.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection Man"title="Reflection Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1853449ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1853449" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1209300">dhcoalition</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-10">06/10/23 12:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Typical byredo- clean kinda boring scent with a high price tag. Aldehydes help balance the florals keeping things fresh and light. Woods add a soft powdery touch and there's a slight hint of sweetness. All in all it smells quite natural and like a expensive yet luxurious laundry detergent. This is easily unisex as it just smells like cleanliness.    <br />
<br />
I actually prefer this as a room spray as it projects an opulent yet calming cozy cleanliness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1853449"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1853449#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1848837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1848837" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bluetsprincess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1749907"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1749907.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bluetsprincess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kismet-Olfactive/Studio-Scent-73110.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73110.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Studio Scent"title="Studio Scent"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1848837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1848837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1749907">Bluetsprincess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-04">06/04/23 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I normally hate aldehydes and overly clean scents. But on my skin this dries down to a very pleasant clean/floral/sweet smell. On my clothes however this remains a headache-inducing fabric softener smell. It's fine to wear around the house or to the office.<br />
<br />
All that said, I lucked out and snagged this online for super cheap. I mean no offense but if you would drop the full retail price of $250 on this, you need to see a financial advisor!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1848837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1848837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1847628" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1847628" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sheherazad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716680"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1716680.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sheherazad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Elixir-Pour-Femme-Parfum-53130.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53130.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Elixir Pour Femme Parfum "title="Elixir Pour Femme Parfum "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1847628ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1847628" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1716680">Sheherazad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-02">06/02/23 18:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Turbo fresh laundry. An aggressively clean, soapy opening. Dry down introduces a faint green lily &amp; a shy Iris in soft, fluffy peek-a-boo play. Stays pretty linear after this. I like it as a room scent, but not sure I want to smell like a floral dryer sheet. Will love using this on my linen.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1847628"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1847628#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1847070" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1847070" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sisina96rv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310820"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sisina96rv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Swiss-Arabian/Kashkha-CPO-54144.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54144.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kashkha CPO"title="Kashkha CPO"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1847070ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1847070" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310820">sisina96rv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-02">06/02/23 00:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have this sample for over a year now. When I tried it in the summer 2022, I had to wash it off my wrist after 15 minutes of suffering. A screechy, sharp detergent, very unpleasant. I tried it several times, but it made me sick. I was very dissappointed with the scent.<br />
<br />
Now we are in the summer 2023 and I tried it again. I do not know what happened with my chemistry, or OK, maybe I know. I stopped taking some tablets. The point is that now Blanche smells different on me. It is pure, fresh and elegant. It reminded me strongly of what I knew and then it clicked - Avon Pur Blanca. I read some reviews about Blanche before writing mine and it turned out that my nose did not deceive me. But whereas I loved Pur Blanca, this is not love, only a pleasant surprise. I feel that Pur Blanca was sweeter, probably I smelled more Lily of the Valley in there. And in Blanche I see similarities with the Chanel No. 5 as well.  <br />
<br />
Well, this is definitely a clean scent and what I like about the Byredos in general that they have a very decent projection and they are very long lasting. The Byredo wearer leaves a trail in the air and the perfumes last 12+ hours, no problem. So despite Blanche being a clean scent, it is perceptible and I find it very suitable for the hot summer days.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1847070"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1847070#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1846857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
