padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672597">Ghadah02</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-01">06/01/23 16:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simple and clean in a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1846857"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1846857#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1835652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1835652" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nataliemarie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/273464"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.273464.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nataliemarie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Thomas-Kosmala/Apres-l-Amour-53742.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53742.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aprs lAmour"title="Aprs lAmour"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1835652ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1835652" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/273464">Nataliemarie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-17">05/17/23 17:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have to agree with the review below. It does smell like BBW original Sea Island Cotton. Not worth the price to me at all. I saw the reference for the Avon perfume, I'm a sucker for SOME Avons, so I may buy that. I have Toy 2, it is wayyyy better, stronger, &amp; it is different, not a dupe. I have Clean Skin (Loooong time fave), I see the comparison, but CS is a much better smelling perfume &amp; it does last a lot longer.     Pass for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1835652"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1835652#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1831453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1831453" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="elly9993"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1546793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1546793.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="elly9993" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Liquides-Imaginaires/Blanche-Bete-70189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blanche Bte"title="Blanche Bte"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1831453ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1831453" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1546793">elly9993</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-12">05/12/23 11:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this and had very low expectations. I do not like overly powdery, floral, rosey scents. However I do like clean and feminine scents, so I was curious about this one. <br />
I was extremely pleasantly surprised. This is so nice. I enjoy that its not as screechy as Cleans Fresh linen which tends to give me a headache. I like the soapy, clean laundry scent that it has. <br />
I could see myself buying this and using it consistently, but the price of Byredo perfumes really turns me off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1831453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1831453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1826342" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1826342" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gourmand_girlie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439075"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1439075.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gourmand_girlie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1826342ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1826342" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1439075">gourmand_girlie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-06">05/06/23 10:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There was a Disney Sleeping Beauty doll released in 1994, that came with a small bottle of "lily of the valley" perfume. This smells almost identical to that perfume, just a slightly more grown-up version. Although this doesn't match the notes, here's what it smells like to my nose:<br />
<br />
- lily of the valley<br />
- baby doll head (powdery/soft plastic)<br />
- creamy rose<br />
- faint iris<br />
<br />
It's all very creamy, soft, and well blended - feels like a fluffy lilac-colored cloud to me.<br />
<br />
Someone below said it came across as more "screechy/synthetic laundry detergent" on their skin, and that's exactly what happened to me too for the first 30 minutes - literally like huffing generic dryer sheets with a too-sharp synthetic accord. <br />
<br />
While the opening is screechy and lasts a while, the dry down is worth waiting for!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1826342"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1826342#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1822109" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1822109" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="meadhbh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1714125"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1714125.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="meadhbh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Sweet-Diamond-Pink-Pepper-25-67023.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67023.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Diamond Pink Pepper 25"title="Sweet Diamond Pink Pepper 25"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1822109ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1822109" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1714125">meadhbh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-01">05/01/23 06:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is gorgeous on my friend, the soft florals really shine and smell beautiful on her. On me however, it's more of a screechy detergent scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1822109"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1822109#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1818274" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1818274" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="silverbellshellsmell"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1732968"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="silverbellshellsmell" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1818274ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1818274" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1732968">silverbellshellsmell</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-26">04/26/23 13:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like dipping your tongue into a vat of laundry detergent grains. <br />
Headache inducing, shrill, no subtlety, no elegance. Total disappointment.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1818274"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1818274#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1816310" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1816310" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Icarel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552215"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1552215.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Icarel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coco-Mademoiselle-611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Mademoiselle"title="Coco Mademoiselle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1816310ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1816310" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1552215">Icarel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-24">04/24/23 07:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I try not to rely too much on rumors or comments, but as they say, there is no smoke without fire... I'm a huge fan of aldehydes, so I thought I'd love it, but not at all. This fragrance, to my nose, really smells like household products or even white vinegar when I tried it in a Byredo counter. Perplexed, as who would want to smell like detergent or a window cleaner? Well please do you, we are all free and different. I'm going to give it a second chance so as not to condemn it for life, by trying it on my skin, but in the shop, it bit my nose off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1816310"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1816310#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1816209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; fresh but really nothing special. Reminds me a bit of Narciso Pure Musc and Clean Skin. Its a non offensive skinscent, lasts pretty long but its just too bland for my taste and way too expensive. If I want fresh &amp; clean I rather grab Glossier You or MFK 724.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1816209"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1816209#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1815857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1815857" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="questionalities"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687268"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="questionalities" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1815857ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1815857" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687268">questionalities</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-23">04/23/23 16:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's laundry - just like freshly-pressed white hotel sheets on that newly made bedspread you press your nose into when jumping into the hotel bed for the first time. While some might find it comforting and fresh, it seems oddly...impersonal to me, detached and almost clinical-like, void of personality. Hotel laundry, but definitely not home laundry. It's clean for sure, but not the kind I'd want to wear on myself. And the exorbitant price tag pulls me away from this completely; you're better off actually doing your laundry to smell like this perfume, and at that point why bother spraying this anymore?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Clean girlies, get in line! Fresh, and smells like aldehydes in a very comforting way. Like fresh laundry, or the day after rain. I would love this as a linen spray. Been admiring this scent for years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1804327"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1804327#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1801940" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1801940" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="basgam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/289187"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.289187.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="basgam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1801940ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1801940" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/289187">basgam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-06">04/06/23 05:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is like some expensive laundry detergent, in most positive way. Very fresh and clean, and cosy at the same time. Reminds me of Clean brand, definitely sharing the same 'clean' vibes. Rather casual and safe to wear, nothing seductive or sexy. And the price.. a bit shocking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1801940"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1801940#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1800223" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1799487" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="beag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1663124"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1663124.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="beag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1799487ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1799487" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1663124">beag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-03">04/03/23 11:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like hospital laundry. but a really fancy hospital for wealthy people where they bring you food in ceramic dishware instead of disposable plates and cups. the nurse who cared for my grandmother after her double hip replacement smelled just like this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1799487"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1799487#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1799359" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LMD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/340113"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LMD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marks-Spencer/Provenance-Amongst-The-Orange-Groves-75651.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75651.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Provenance Amongst The Orange Groves"title="Provenance Amongst The Orange Groves"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1799359ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1799359" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/340113">LMD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-03">04/03/23 08:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean musky floral. Ever so slightly sweet. Smells pretty similar to Clean Reserve Skin. Pleasant and inoffensive but nothing special.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1799359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1799359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1797555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1797555" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HannahRosesAreRed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705684"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1705684.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HannahRosesAreRed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Bubble-Bath-60105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bubble Bath"title="Bubble Bath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1797555ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1797555" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1705684">HannahRosesAreRed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-31">03/31/23 19:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't know what's driving this trend of pairing pink peppercorn with rose, but I'm more than OK with it. Byredo "Blanche" is beautiful. It's the quintessential clean aldehyde fragrance. It's refreshing, sparkling, cool and calming without being too cold; it evokes fresh air on a clear day, newly washed laundry, clean linens and freshly made beds, and the soft, subtly floral muskiness of skin just out of the shower. <br />
<br />
"Blanche" boasts rose as a top and peony as a heart note, but I would hesitate to call it a primarily floral fragrance. Much like fellow Byredo fragrance "Rose of No Man's Land," this one opens with a sparkly-fresh pink peppercorn note with warm and inviting rose. But whereas "Rose of No Man's Land" is deeply sensual and mysterious, "Blanche" is a softer, cooler and calmer, inviting fragrance. The bottom notes of musk and blond woods have a skin-like, cashmeran effect, and combined with the top notes of aldehydes, create a distinct "soap" scent. I can see why some might be put off by this fragrance. But I, for one, love it. <br />
<br />
On my skin, it's an extremely sensuous aquatic fragrance. The rose and aldehyde notes come forward front and center. It feels so good and clean and approachable both on skin and the scent card. There is a deeply nostalgic quality to "Blanche," evoking childhood bubble baths before bed, settling in for the night in clean sheets with the window open on a warm night. This might be one of my new favorite fragrances. I could see wearing this work as easily as spraying it before bed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1797555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1797555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1795862" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1795862" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Edemay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/918978"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.918978.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Edemay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Rose-Gourmand-For-Her-63268.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63268.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Gourmand For Her"title="Rose Gourmand For Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1795862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1795862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/918978">Edemay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-29">03/29/23 17:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Disgusting <br />
Smells like cheap air freshener from the $2 shop<br />
<br />
Im dead serious go buy a cheap cotton scented toilet spray it will smell the same</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1795862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1795862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1795731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1795731" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jasmineaeisha"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410693"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1410693.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jasmineaeisha" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Idole-Nectar-74137.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74137.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Idle Nectar"title="Idle Nectar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1795731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1795731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410693">Jasmineaeisha</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-29">03/29/23 13:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I mean it projects &amp; smell clean but idk if I can justify the $280 price tag. Its very much giving mild hand soap &amp; laundry detergent. I will say its a very pleasant scent. Like the comfort of being in the schools nurse office waiting for your mama to pick you up and take you home early from school :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1795731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1795731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786882" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1786882" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kimberly.b.stone"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1038473"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1038473.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kimberly.b.stone" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Bare-75277.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75277.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bare"title="Bare"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1786882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1786882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1038473">kimberly.b.stone</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-18">03/18/23 16:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The first spray reminds me greatly of "Je Reviens" from Worth, but with a big splash of some cool and fresh herbs on top. White flowers are there, certainly, and woods.  I think the powder must be tempering the scent so it's less like Tide, more like soap on skin. It's well balanced so that all these elements - aldehydes, woods, powder, flowers, soap - are there but no one element is shouting out the others. It's more complex than a minimalist perfume, but it's one you could wear any day, any time, and smell good, in a "you smell good" way, not in a "your perfume smells good." <br />
<br />
Enough sillage for this light and white scent, less sillage than you'd want and expect from a heavier scent.  Lasting well on me for 5+ hours, without having faded to an entirely skin scent yet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1786882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1786882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1785928" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1785928" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Evie01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Evie01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1785928ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1785928" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676821">Evie01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-17">03/17/23 11:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried this one on paper, as I am addicted to fresh clean scents.<br />
At first it was strong laundry detergent, but then changed to the smell of green flower stems. Im surprised that there are no green notes listed</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1785928"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1785928#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1783268" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1783268" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cyclone1391"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/666114"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.666114.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cyclone1391" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1783268ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1783268" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/666114">cyclone1391</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-14">03/14/23 09:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received a free sample of this when I ordered Mojave Ghost direct from Byredo. I really enjoy this but uncertain if it's worth the price tag. I much prefer this to anything from the Clean brand. This is basically a higher quality Bath &amp; Body Works Sea Island Cotton, not the current cotton offering from Bath &amp; Body Works. Very long-lasting skin scent. If you were to wear this daily, I could see it being worth the price, because 2-3 spritzes lasts all day whereas the Bath &amp; Body Works fine fragrance mist would require several more sprays and reapplication. Plus, the Bath &amp; Body Works scent is discontinued, driving it's price up. For occasional wear, I would just find an old Bath &amp; Body Works bottle. For daily wear, I would pay for this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1783268"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1783268#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1780595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1780595" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maddison21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370562"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370562.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maddison21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1780595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1780595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); A year later, I still decided to try it and realized that it needed a special state and mood. Before buying, I advise you to wear it on yourself first</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1780595"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1780595#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1778752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1080024">ashleyj317</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-08">03/08/23 20:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a love hate relationship with this fragrance. I love so much about this. Something if off putting and i think it's the aldehyde. <br />
I think on clothing/fabric it smells amazing. It turns into something gross on skin. Maybe it's just me. I'm still on the fence of purchasing it. I do have rose of no man's land which is very heavy, very strong and gives me a headache after a while.  I also have bal d'africa I'm spelling it wrong and i love it too and i normally hate citrus.  <br />
You can find these in Paris 50-80$ cheaper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1778752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1778752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1778163" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;                             <div id="parent445222" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/524549">spidola</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-01-11">01/11/14 08:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My 9 years old son told:"It smells like a wind..."</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="445222"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=445222#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1425870" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1425870" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rodween"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1090208.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rodween" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Flower-by-Kenzo-72.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flower by Kenzo"title="Flower by Kenzo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1425870ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1425870" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1090208">Rodween</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-10">10/10/21 14:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I LOVE this perfume so very much! omg<br />
I just literally pulled the trigger and finally bought this perfume earlier today after lusting over and testing this one for months. <br />
I'm like currently head over heels about Byredo Blanche!<br />
I've always thought the scent itself of this doesn't justify its hefty price tag. But I was so wrong!<br />
Some people may have said you're gonna waste your money buying this just because you'd just smell like laundry detergent. <br />
But don't really take that opinion too seriously. <br />
Because this perfume is more than just smelling like a clean freshly laundered clothes.<br />
There is something in this perfume that smells expensive compared to alot of the other regular soapy perfumes I've tried. <br />
This is one of the most beautiful aldehydic clean perfume I've ever smelled. Very clean, uplifting and confidence boosting.<br />
<br />
As a lover of clean, soapy and fresh scents. This is a huge and important addition to my perfume collection. Im a 1-2 spray kinda person, and I don't press the nozzle fully yet and still this lasts over 6-8 hours to me and it settles beautifully on my skin (it doesn't change into a whole different scent like some niche perfumes do) which im so pleased about.<br />
<br />
Currently smelling this perfume while writing this review and it just makes me happy and zen. I honestly can't wait to wear this perfume alot and possibly make it as a signature scent for me. Im so Inlove with this one! lol <br />
I haven't been this genuinely excited with a perfume in a while.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1425870"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1425870#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1206572" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1206572" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KittyDeBeauvoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1212801"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1212801.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KittyDeBeauvoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sarah-Jessica-Parker/Stash-SJP-40750.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40750.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Stash SJP"title="Stash SJP"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1206572ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1206572" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1212801">KittyDeBeauvoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-01">08/01/20 23:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Considering this contains all notes I love, I'm not surprised I am low-key OBSESSED WITH THIS.<br />
<br />
It's a more floral, more typically-"feminine" version of MMM Replica's "Lazy Sunday Morning". I find it much more airy and fresher than "NR For Her". They might live on the same street, but not the same home. :) <br />
<br />
It's a gorgeous, airy, extremely pretty, fresh, floral scent. <br />
It definitely has those light sunshine-esque aldehydes. Not the more harsh, deeper kinds that you find in "Chanel No.5" &amp; co. These aldehydes are gentle and friendly to all. It mingles with an extremely pretty and gentle blend of rose and peony. The violet is there, but more subdue.<br />
<br />
It does later calm down to include more sandalwood and a predominant musk. Again - the most gorgeous, pretty musk ever. This is a wrist-sniffer. I'm constantly smelling this beauty on my skin because I have no self-control. <br />
<br />
Its longevity and sillage could be better. There's no denial there. And those Byredo prices...*shudder*. BUT! ...I'm playing with the thought. I'm transitioning into *considering* buying this. It's just THAT PRETTY. <br />
<br />
I've used the word "pretty" four times now, so if pretty is what you're looking for in a scent... sniff this one.<br />
<br />
***<br />
<br />
Kitty rating: 8.5/10.<br />
<br />
***EDIT: 08-02-2021 - Okay, I bought a (slightly cheaper) bottle from online, and it is amaaaaaaazing. It's feminine, fresh, elegant, inoffensive, and - YES - PRETTY!***</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1206572"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1206572#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent911850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc911850" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="annettepe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/219457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.219457.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="annettepe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Irish-Leather-18393.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18393.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Irish Leather"title="Irish Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma911850ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd911850" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/219457">annettepe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-02-15">02/15/18 01:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blanche is my sister's signature spring and summer scent. Its funny to read all the negative comments because I personally think its such a beautiful perfume. <br />
<br />
Firstly, I can smell it on my sister for hours. And as soon as she comes, the whole room/area would fill up with Blanche. It is a very wearable scent, very pleasant. It is crisp and clean. There is something very innocent and simple about it too. If I were to describe the scent using the notes I would agree that the soft aldehyde and very soft white musk is the most dominant with a mixture of soft florals throughout. It somehow also reminds me of baby scents, like the Switzal or Johnson&amp;Johnson baby soaps. Perhaps this is why I also consider it a very comforting and soft scent. It gives a feeling of happiness. I know perhaps for some people it is not worth it as Byredo is such an upscale brand, but I think the scent is absolutely gorgeous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="911850"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=911850#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent561352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc561352" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Germany"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/137168"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.137168.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Germany" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-Cologne-51692.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51692.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus Cologne"title="Aventus Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma561352ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd561352" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/137168">Germany</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-01-23">01/23/15 08:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet clean air , coming from laundry dried outside in the wind. <br />
I really like this fragrance , for a clean soapy kind of perfume this is perfect. It's not a wow scent it's just really pleasant for some days when you want to have that clean showered feel of "no perfume " ,,, maybe on a hot day, or an interview , or just as an everyday clean feel. ,,,Blanche is just that , I love all the notes in it so no wonder I am a fan. <br />
<br />
Besides being a soapy and clean fresh scent this also has some elegance to it, like an aloof feeling. Think Iris Poudre , Frederic Malle ! <br />
The name Blanche is perfect for this fragrance , I love when the name really matches the smell, also the bottles are a piece of art , simplistic, minimalistic with a magnetic top. Luxury in a minimal style. My type of idea of beauty. <br />
In the sense of less is more. A lot more ! <br />
<br />
Aldehydes are clean and sparkly and add that soapy quality. Rose makes this fresh and violets sweet and a little powdery , and musk , in here is white clean musk, nothing dirty about this fragrance ,,,the sandalwood grounds this yummy cloud into a nice cozy base , well done scent and one to consider ! <br />
<br />
Also lots of soapy aldehyde scents of that genere are rather old fashioned and this one is more modern which may appeal to some.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="561352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=561352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="6686" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc832675" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jtay"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24169"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.24169.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jtay" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma832675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd832675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24169">Jtay</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-06-15">06/15/17 17:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>"Laundry Detergent Intense"<br />
<br />
Very aldehyde-heavy. Not even laundry detergent smells this much like laundry detergent (if that makes any sense).<br />
<br />
If you love "clean" scents, give this a try!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="832675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=832675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent293000" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc293000" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sherapop"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.17027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sherapop" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-L-Eau-38543.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38543.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 L'Eau"title="Chanel No 5 L'Eau"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma293000ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd293000" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/17027">sherapop</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-10-11">10/11/12 07:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I came to Byredo BLANCHE with zero preconceptions about this house, and my immediate reaction was "reminds me of Costume National SCENT SHEER." So, yes, it has that white noise, minimalist vibe. This composition seems a bit more complex and slightly green. The violet here must be violet leaves, because it is not at all sweet. <br />
<br />
The musk is clean, but this is not really my kind of thing. To me this is a unisex scent in a somewhat negative way: rather sterile and uninviting. I'm sure that others would like this, but to me it smells a bit like laundry starch.<br />
<br />
Try before you buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="293000"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=293000#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1089193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1089193" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bubbles1964"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1095199"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1095199.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bubbles1964" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bastide-Aix-en-Provence/Lavande-in-Love-62387.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62387.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lavande in Love"title="Lavande in Love"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1089193ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1089193" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); This is too much synthetic for me to handle, and polarizing for a reason. I honestly cant undestand the appeal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="1089193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=1089193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent839300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc839300" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RB75"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/964148"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.964148.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RB75" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma839300ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd839300" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/964148">RB75</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-07-07">07/07/17 15:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Old fashioned soap bar. Headache after 10 minutes, had to wash this thing off my wrists. <br />
If you were into the original "Clean" perhaps you would like "Blanche" which is much stronger than "Clean". <br />
<br />
My least favorite of all Byredo scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="6686"comment_id="839300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Blanche-6686.html?ccid=839300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="6686" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

    <div class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 0.5em;"><span>Perfume Encyclopedia</span></div>
<div>Perfumes: <b>98,514</b><br/>
    Fragrance Reviews: <b>1,929,332</b><br/>
    Perfume lovers: <b>1,388,792</b><br/>
    <span style="
            background: -moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%, rgba(202,230,249,0.9) 47.2%, rgba(246,246,246,1) 100%);
            background: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%,rgba(202,230,249,0.9) 47.2%,rgba(246,246,246,1) 100%);
            background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255,255,255,1) 0%,rgba(202,230,249,0.9) 47.2%,rgba(246,246,246,1) 100%);
            ">Online right now: <b>3,658</b></span><br/>
    <visitors-histogram :visitors='[1088,1030,1297,1020,1039,1042,1053,1134,1064,1030,1037,1013,1108,1077,1041,1133,1160,1150,1216,1227,1088,1088,1068,1062,1109,1078,1079,1130,990]'></visitors-histogram>
</div>

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
